sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbatchschduldfk ( batch_schdul_id , execut_schdul_dfk_se ) VALUES ( #batchSchdulId# , #executSchdulDfkSe# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbatchschduldfk SET batch_schdul_id = #batchSchdulId# , execut_schdul_dfk_se = #executSchdulDfkSe# WHERE 1 = 1 AND batch_schdul_id = #batchSchdulId# AND execut_schdul_dfk_se = #executSchdulDfkSe#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnbatchschduldfk WHERE 1 = 1 AND batch_schdul_id = #batchSchdulId# AND execut_schdul_dfk_se = #executSchdulDfkSe#
sqlMap.select: SELECT batch_schdul_id , execut_schdul_dfk_se FROM COMTNBATCHSCHDULDFK WHERE batch_schdul_id = #batchSchdulId# AND execut_schdul_dfk_se = #executSchdulDfkSe#

SELECT A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE FROM ( SELECT BATCH_SCHDUL_ID , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE , ROWNUM FROM COMTNBATCHSCHDULDFK WHERE 1=1
BATCH_SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword#
EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY BATCH_SCHDUL_ID DESC , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNBATCHSCHDULDFK WHERE 1=1
BATCH_SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword#
EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
